name: Heart-Engendered Art III
description:
I connected an electrocardiographic monitor to a person, and fed the information from the ECG into a generative graph. That way, we get pictures created by the heart.
This picture is dedicated to my father, who died of coronary heart disease. His favorite book was "The Little Prince".

«It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.»
-Antoine de Saint-Exupery The Little Prince

30% of the profit will go to the Charity Foundation "Children's Heart"
